data.text: «Wooɠula lɛɛ, è pɛtɛ ni nu ɠa è wooɠaaʋote.
Mazɔlɔɔ ziiɠulagi ɠa a ɗa ɠimalala nui ʋa,
Gaamazu, gè ɠimalala nui ɠaani, sape ɗa ziɛ,
‹Ná-dointi ti mina ʋoluzeizu nɔpɛ sɔlɔɔ,
Nii a faza, naama lɔnɔgi ɠɛ ga taɠiligaa tɔnɔ,
«Maanɔɠɔi la ʋɔnɔga é ʋa ɠula fufiligi zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ nui ɠa zɔlɔɔsu kpɔlɔi zɔlɔɔ fai ma,
«Ni nà ɠɛni de, GALA nɔ ɠa nà la ʋoluzei ba,
Niiti é ti ɠɛɛzu, naati ta ga faa wolaiti, nu la ti ɠaaɠa,
Tɔ ɠa a ɗa tonai ʋu eteai zu ná pɛ,
Niiti ti maayeiɗai, toɠa naati buzeɠe, ti ɠaaɠooza,
Toɠa ɗa naati ta-vaazeikpasuiti suɠoloɠolo, niiti ti ga keleɠele nu ɲɔiti,
Toɠa ɗa ɠima nuiti so ga balii, nii é ga ta-ɠeleɠele ɲɔi,
Ta ɗa ziɠa kpidii ʋa folo ɓekpegi,
GALA ka ɗa bala nui ɠula ti-laaʋɛ ma woɠa zɔkpɔi laawu,
Kito ka maawɔin nui ʋɛ,
«Naa ɠa é ba deɠɛmu, undaanɛ nui ɠa ga naa, zɔi GALA ge maaɠolozu.
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ka nu ɓɔlɔ, é è ɠɛdɛ ɓalaa.
Kidaaʋili seizu lɔzita zu, toɠa è ɠula ti zu,
Pului ma ziɛgi zu, toɠa è ɠizo saai ma,
Ɗa lɔɔɠuzu zɔlɔɔ nu nɛgi ná-kpakɔi ʋa,
Ɗa ɲɛɛɠula faa zuɠoloɠologi ta pului zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ minazeɠe ka ɠɛ wo yɔɠɔzu wa dɔɓɔzu ɠɔtuiti,
Ziilɛigi ɠa ɠɛ ɗa-ʋɛlɛi wu ná pɛ,
Ɗa pɛtɛ ga ɗa-ʋɛlɛyeɠei ɠaa ɠa wɔɔlɔ,
Ɗa yei kabai zu ga pɔlɔzaɠadai,
Wɛlɛ, naa ɠa gi ɠidaai bu gola, tɔ ɠana.
